# Data 

## Covid-19-Gesetz

Data from Political Atlas of [BfS](https://www.atlas.bfs.admin.ch/maps/12/de/16394_15864_15863_259/25577.html#)

```{r warning=FALSE}
covid <- read_xlsx("data-raw/Covid-19-Gesetz/25577_131.xlsx", 
                   skip = 3) %>% 
  rename(GMDNR = `Regions-ID`,
         GMDNAME = Regionsname,
         vote_yes = ...3) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(GMDNR),
         !is.na(GMDNAME)) %>% 
  mutate(GMDNR = as.numeric(GMDNR))
```

Excluding cantonal votes from abroad:  

```{r}
covid %>% 
  filter(str_detect(GMDNAME, fixed("Ausland")))
```

```{r}
covid %<>% 
  filter(! str_detect(GMDNAME, fixed("Ausland")))
```

Dataset consists of `r scales::number(length(unique(covid$GMDNR)), big.mark = ",")` communities.

## Communities

swissBOUNDARIES3D **2021** from [swisstopo](https://shop.swisstopo.admin.ch/en/products/landscape/boundaries3D).  

```{r include=FALSE}
gem_st <- read_rds("../ISPM_geo/data/swisstopo/swissBOUNDARIES3D/gem_21.Rds") %>% 
  st_transform(crs = 2056) %>% 
  filter(! GMDNR %in% c(2391, 5391, 5394))
```

swisstopo dataset consists of `r scales::number(length(unique(gem_st$GMDNR)), big.mark = ",")` communities.

```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
length(unique(gem_st$GMDNR))

st_drop_geometry(gem_st) %>% 
  anti_join(covid)

covid %>% 
  anti_join(st_drop_geometry(gem_st))
```

## Link

Using `GMDNR` for deterministic linkage.  

```{r}
gem_st %<>% 
  left_join(covid)
```

There are few communities that do not exist in the voting dataset:  

```{r echo=FALSE}
gem_st %>% 
  st_drop_geometry() %>% 
  filter(is.na(vote_yes)) %>% 
  select(GMDNR) %>% 
  left_join(st_drop_geometry(read_rds("../ISPM_geo/data/ag-b-00.03-875-gg21-new/gem_21.Rds")))
```

## Swiss-SEP 

Using version 3.0. 

```{r echo=FALSE}
sep3 <- read_rds("FINAL/RDS/ssep3_user_geo.Rds") %>% 
  select(gisid, ssep3, ssep3_d) %>% 
  mutate(ssep3_d = factor(ssep3_d,
                          levels = 1:10,
                          labels = c("1st - lowest", 
                                     "2", "3", "4", 
                                     "5th decile", 
                                     "6", "7", "8", "9", 
                                     "10th - highest")))
```

Dataset consists of `r scales::number(nrow(sep3), big.mark = ",")` n'hoods, each assigned to decile of index.

```{r}
st_drop_geometry(sep3) %>% 
  frq(ssep3_d)
```

## STATPOP

Using 2019 STATPOP population file.  

```{r include=FALSE}
r19_bu <- read_dta("../SNC_core/data-raw/statpop/r19_bu_orig.dta") %>% 
  select(r19_egid_snc, 
         r19_ecoord, r19_ncoord,
         r19_gdename, r19_nrpers_main) %>% 
  # select(r19_nrpers_total, r19_nrpers_perm) %>% 
  # filter(!is.na(r19_ncoord)) %>% 
  # filter(!is.na(r19_ecoord)) %>% 
  filter(r19_nrpers_main > 0) %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c("r19_ecoord", "r19_ncoord"), 
           crs = 2056,
           remove = TRUE)
```

Dataset consists of `r scales::number(nrow(r19_bu), big.mark = ",")` buildings with at least one resident.

The nearest building with SSEP 3 was found; point dataset was then overlaid with municipality boundaries and summary measures of population based index were created and population level SEP was aggregated by municipality. `r19_nrpers_main` was used as population weight.^[Slightly different populations would be obtained with different conceptual models of *residential populations* by using either `r19_nrpers_total` or `r19_nrpers_perm` variables!]

## Population based community averages of SEP

```{r eval=FALSE, include=TRUE}
r19_bu_sep <- st_join(r19_bu, sep3, join = st_nearest_feature)

nearest <- st_nearest_feature(r19_bu, sep3)
r19_bu_sep$dist <- st_distance(r19_bu_sep, sep3[nearest, ], 
                               by_element = TRUE)
rm(nearest); gc()

summary(r19_bu_sep$dist)

# View(st_drop_geometry(r19_bu_sep))

r19_bu_sep_gem21 <- 
  st_join(r19_bu_sep, gem_st, join = st_intersects)

# r19_bu_sep_gem21 %>%
#   filter(is.na(GMDNR))

# tm_shape(gem_bfs) +
#   tm_polygons() +
#   tm_shape(r19_bu_sep_gem21 %>% filter(is.na(GMDNR)) %>% select(-r19_gdename)) +
#   tm_dots()

r19_bu_sep_gem21 <- r19_bu_sep_gem21 %>% 
  st_drop_geometry() %>% 
  relocate(GMDNR, .after = r19_egid_snc)  

# View(r19_bu_sep_gem21)

write_rds(r19_bu_sep_gem21, "data/statpop/r19_bu_sep_gem21.rds")
```

```{r include=FALSE}
r19_bu_sep_gem21 <- read_rds("data/statpop/r19_bu_sep_gem21.rds") 
```

```{r}
temp <- r19_bu_sep_gem21 %>% 
  select(GMDNR, ssep3, r19_nrpers_main) %>% 
  uncount(r19_nrpers_main) %>% 
  group_by(GMDNR) %>% 
  summarise(pop = n(),
            # ssep3_mean = mean(ssep3),
            ssep3_median = median(ssep3)) %>% 
  ungroup() 

ssep3_gem_21_pop <- left_join(gem_st, temp) %>% 
  mutate(median_ssep3_pop_d = ntile(ssep3_median, 10)) %>% 
  mutate(median_ssep3_pop_d = factor(median_ssep3_pop_d,
                                     levels = 1:10,
                                     labels = c("1st - lowest", 
                                                "2", "3", "4", 
                                                "5th decile", 
                                                "6", "7", "8", "9", 
                                                "10th - highest")))

frq(ssep3_gem_21_pop$median_ssep3_pop_d)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
rm(temp); gc()
write_rds(ssep3_gem_21_pop, "data/ssep3_gem_21_pop.rds")
```

Final map using median index; bubbles scaled to number of people (2019)  

```{r, layout="l-body-outset"}
ssep3_gem_21_pop %>% 
  tm_shape() +
  tm_dots(size = "pop", col = "median_ssep3_pop_d", 
          palette = "RdYlGn",
          scale = .5,  shape = 19)
```

# Associations

## Scatter

### Unweighted

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
ssep3_gem_21_pop %>% 
  st_drop_geometry() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = ssep3_median, y = vote_yes)) + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.25) + 
  theme_ipsum_rc() +
  xlab("Swiss-SEP index") + ylab("% vote yes")
```

### Weighted

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
ssep3_gem_21_pop %>% 
  st_drop_geometry() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = ssep3_median, y = vote_yes, size = pop)) + 
  geom_smooth(aes(weight = pop), method = "lm") +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.25) + 
  theme_ipsum_rc() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  xlab("Swiss-SEP index") + ylab("% vote yes")
```

## Box plot

```{r echo=FALSE}
ssep3_gem_21_pop %>% 
  st_drop_geometry() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = median_ssep3_pop_d, y = vote_yes)) + 
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme_ipsum_rc() +
  xlab("Swiss-SEP index") + ylab("% vote yes")
```

## Histograms

```{r echo=FALSE}
ssep3_gem_21_pop %>% 
  st_drop_geometry() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = vote_yes, 
             y = median_ssep3_pop_d, 
             fill = stat(x))) +
  geom_density_ridges_gradient(scale = 3, rel_min_height = 0.01) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(name = "% vote yes") +
  theme_ipsum_rc() +
  ylab("Swiss-SEP index decile") + xlab("% vote yes")
```

## Correlations

### Unweighted

```{r}
cor.test(ssep3_gem_21_pop$ssep3_median, 
         ssep3_gem_21_pop$vote_yes, 
         method = "pearson")
```

### Weighted

```{r}
wtd.cor(ssep3_gem_21_pop$ssep3_median, 
        ssep3_gem_21_pop$vote_yes, 
        weight = ssep3_gem_21_pop$pop)
```

## Outliers

### Lowest % yes

```{r}
ssep3_gem_21_pop %>% 
  st_drop_geometry() %>% 
  select(-ssep3_median) %>% 
  mutate(vote_yes = scales::number(vote_yes, accuracy = 0.1)) %>% 
  filter(vote_yes < 30) %>% 
  datatable()
```

### Low SEP, high % yes

```{r}
ssep3_gem_21_pop %>% 
  st_drop_geometry() %>% 
  select(-ssep3_median) %>% 
  mutate(vote_yes = scales::number(vote_yes, accuracy = 0.1)) %>% 
  filter(vote_yes > 60 & 
           as.numeric(median_ssep3_pop_d) <= 2) %>% 
  arrange(desc(vote_yes)) %>% 
  datatable()
```

### High SEP, low % yes

```{r}
ssep3_gem_21_pop %>% 
  st_drop_geometry() %>% 
  select(-ssep3_median) %>% 
  mutate(vote_yes = scales::number(vote_yes, accuracy = 0.1)) %>% 
  filter(vote_yes < 50 & 
           as.numeric(median_ssep3_pop_d) >= 8) %>% 
  arrange(desc(vote_yes)) %>% 
  datatable()
```
